message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $150?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a living from this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $165. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still feel that $150 would be a fair price for the product. Could we possibly meet at that point?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $162. It's a great deal considering the product's value and quality. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit.
